    model=Comment
    form_class=EditForm
    template_name='comment_update.html'
    success_url=reverse_lazy('comment_url')
class CommentDeleteView(DeleteView):
    model=Comment
    template_name='comment_delete.html'
    success_url=reverse_lazy('comment_url')
